label: Olympic Stories
description: Don't want the games to end? Stay in the Olympic Spirit with these fiction and nonfiction books featuring some champion tales.

list.label: The boys in the boat : nine Americans and their epic quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics
Games of deception : the true story of the first U.S. Olympic basketball team at the 1936 Olympics in Hitler's Germany
The naked Olympics : ancient Greece's original games
Rush for the gold : mystery at the Olympics
